tasks.title: Fix NodeModulesMonitor checksum calculation timeouts
tasks.description:
Resolve timeout issues in NodeModulesMonitor tests that cause test failures and build instability:
- Checksum calculation timeout for exit.js during monitoring
- Performance issues with large numbers of files
- Monitoring startup failures causing test suite failures
success_criteria: NodeModulesMonitor tests pass without timeout failures
Checksum calculation completes within reasonable time limits
Performance test handles large file numbers efficiently
Build process completes without monitoring-related failures

tasks.title: Continue development and improvements
tasks.description: Continue with the current development tasks, fix any issues, and improve the codebase quality.

tasks.title: Review Strike 1: Ensure the project builds completely without errors
tasks.description:
Perform a comprehensive code review with focus on: Ensure the project builds completely without errors

Check the entire codebase and ensure this criterion is met.

## CRITICAL FAILURE RESPONSE PROTOCOL

IF BUILD FAILS: Create specific TASK CREATION tasks in TODO.json to fix build issues:
- Missing dependencies installation tasks
- Build configuration setup tasks  
- Compilation error resolution tasks
- Environment setup tasks
- Build script creation tasks

CRITICAL: Use TaskManager API to add these tasks immediately when build failures are detected.

## SUCCESS CRITERIA
- Mark this review task as completed ONLY if the criterion is fully met
- If criterion fails, you MUST create remediation tasks using TaskManager API before marking review as completed
- All new tasks should be actionable, specific, and include proper dependencies/important_files parameters

## TASK CREATION REQUIREMENT
When creating remediation tasks, ensure each task includes:
- Clear success criteria
- Appropriate mode (DEVELOPMENT/TESTING/REFACTORING)
- Specific file dependencies
- Realistic time estimates
- High priority for critical issues

Use the task-creation.md guidelines for optimal task structure.

tasks.title: Complete multi-agent system test fixes

Fix remaining 7 multi-agent test failures to achieve 100% test success:
- MultiAgentOrchestrator task distribution failures
- Parallel execution plan creation failures
- Integration test workflow failures

tasks.title: Fix Jest coverage collection contamination issues
tasks.description:
Resolve coverage collection failures caused by node_modules contamination:
- Coverage reporter contamination preventing collection
- CoverageWorker JSON contamination errors
- Exit.js contamination during coverage runs
- Safe coverage collection script improvements
success_criteria: Coverage collection runs without contamination errors
No JSON syntax errors in node_modules files during coverage
Coverage meets minimum thresholds (90%+ overall, 100% critical modules)
